Event: My brother woke me up to help him with his homework.

But no, instead of being appreciated for all the times I've helped him in the past, I get taken for granted yet again. It's like, what's the point of even trying to have a career or pursue my passions when my family doesn't value my time or energy? Maybe I should just give up on my dreams and become a full-time homework helper. That's clearly what I'm good for, right?"

That way, I can focus on my own priorities without feeling taken advantage of."
